alert.note: Alert for Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 12:31PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Putnam, southeastern Paulding, southeastern Henry and northeastern Van Wert Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ottoville, or 11 miles north of Delphos, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kalida and Continental around 1240 PM EDT. Glandorf around 1245 PM EDT. Ottawa around 1250 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Leipsic and Deshler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
